name: SightLine (toominio, Omra13, AshleyKeep)
description:
Collect all the gold, escape and become one of the most wanted bandits of the wild wild west!

Dodge the eyes of the guards and use your environment by:

WASD => Moving

,  (comma) or shift => Slowing down time

. (fullstop) or space => Speeding up time

CREDITS:

Sound: Ashley Keep

Art: Ashley Keep, toominio, Omra

Programming: toominio, Omra

Level Design: Omra
